name: RAVEN-BOT
description: A simple yet complicated WhatsApp bot, ♤Enjoy♡

DEV.description: Enter the Bot number here without + or spaces "," Ex: 254114660061,254780147229

HEROKU_API.description: Put a Heroku account Api key here, will be required to update your bot without redeploying again

CODE.description: Country code without +, used for antiforeign feature (e.g., 254)

SESSION.description: Paste your Session ID after pairing the bot (required for authentication)

APP_NAME.description: repeat the appname you entered above, use lowercase letters
